column1: e jwale ubatla hoamoha babang hobaneng
letsatsing lee ha leye ke eng
leskabalaatamelang mono dinthong tsa batho tsebo
lebitso la yona ke mang patsi
uaqala jwale hoetsa mesebetsi esenang thuso
urata hore hotlohlahe lentswe lahao feela
ke yane kantle akhanna diramo ke yane
tsamayang leye kwana leye hotswa kwana
